repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: A palm leaf manuscript containing the first four aṣṭakas (i.e. RV 1.1-6.61) of the Ṛgveda Saṃhitā (saṃhitāpāṭha text), with Vedic accents marked.

msItem.title: Ṛgveda
msItem.rubric: śubham astu śrī gaṇādhipataye namaḥ | śrī gurubhyo namaḥ | hariḥ oṃ |
msItem.incipit:
agnim īle purohitaṃ yajñasya devam ṛtvijaṃ | hotāraṃ ratnadhātamaṃ | agniḥ pūrvebhir ṛṣibhir īḍyo nūtanair uta | sa devām̐ eha vakṣati | agninā
rayim aśnavat poṣam eva dive dive | yaśasaṃ vīravattamam | agne yaṃ yajñam adhvaraṃ viśvataḥ paribhūr asi | sa id deveṣu gacchati | agnir hotā kavikratuḥ satyaḥ citraśravastamaḥ | devo devebhir ā gamat || — 1 || — yad aṃga
msItem.explicit: stuṣe janaṃ suvrataṃ navyasībhir | mā kākambīram ud vṛho vanaspatiṃ | ā sakhāyaḥ sabardughāṃ | ā yaḥ paprau bhānunā roda̍sī ubhe | yajñā yajñā vo agnaye |
msItem.finalRubric:
yajñā yajñā ca udutyac cakṣur ehi vāṃ dvādaśā iti śrīśākalasaṃhitāyāṃ caturthāṣṭake aṣṭa
mo ’dhyāyaḥ ||—|| śrī kṛṣṇārpaṇam astu ||—|| caturthāṣṭakaṃ samāptaṃ ||—|| śrī ||—||

extent.measure: 4 guard folios inserted at the beginning of the bundle, 172 numbered folios, 1 blank folio inserted between ff. 40 and 41, 1 smaller folio inserted between ff. 86 and 87, 5 guard folios inserted at the end of the bundle.

supportDesc.foliation: Nandināgarī numerals, on the left margin of the recto, 1 to 172.
supportDesc.condition: Good state of preservation, in spite of some bore holes produced by insects. The manuscript is inked until f. 39v2; uninked between ff. 39v2-40v; inked between ff. 41r-86v; uninked between ff. 87r-107v; inked between ff. 108r-117v, uninked between ff. 118r-172v.

additions.desc: A smaller folio inscribed on the verso, uninked, and unnumbered inserted between ff. 86 and 87.

listBibl.bibl: Janert, Klaus Ludwig, Poti, N. Narasimhan. 1985. Verzeichnis der orientalischen Handschriften in Deutschland. Band II, 7. Stuttgart: F. Steiner. p. 852.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces between words added where possible.
